body_html:
Hi caisq
The report error is : ufunc"is nan" not supported for the input types, and the inputs could not be safely coerced to any supported types according to the casting rule"safe"
When I use filter "has inf or nan", I guess it is some conflict about input file or save the data. So when I temporary remove the save data " self.saver.save(self.sess, self.model_dir + 'snapshot', global_step = step) " and load weights before I add "tf_debug.LocalCLIDebugWrapperSession(self.sess)", it works.

body:
Hi caisq
The report error is :   ufunc"is nan" not supported for the input types, and the inputs could not be safely coerced to any supported types according to the casting rule"safe"
When I use filter "has inf or nan", I guess it is some conflict about input file or save the data. So when I temporary remove  the save data "  self.saver.save(self.sess, self.model_dir + 'snapshot', global_step = step) " and load weights before I add "tf_debug.LocalCLIDebugWrapperSession(self.sess)", it works.
